title: Weekly Wrap: Streaming Service Wars, Plus How Our Minds Handle The Unknown
description: Apple's announcement that it would enter the competitive world of video streaming services has Sam wondering what the future of TV looks like. He's joined by 'Invisibilia' hosts Alix Spiegel and Hanna Rosin, who are digging into how our minds fill in gaps when something is unknown.
